name: vc-di-ecdsa-test-suite
description: Test suite for the ECDSA Data Integrity cryptosuites

scripts.test: mocha tests/ --reporter @digitalbazaar/mocha-w3c-interop-reporter --reporter-options abstract="$PWD/config/abstract.hbs",reportDir="$PWD/reports",respec="$PWD/config/respec.json",suiteLog='./suite.log',templateData="$PWD/reports/index.json",title="Data Integrity ecdsa 2019 Interoperability Report 1.0" --timeout 15000 --preserve-symlinks
scripts.fetch-vc-di-ecdsa-test-vectors: if [ ! -e tests/input/vc-di-ecdsa ]; then git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/w3c/vc-di-ecdsa.git tests/input/vc-di-ecdsa; fi

author.name: W3C Verifiable Credentials Working Group Contributors
